title: Privacy Notice
text:
This is a local service. Your video and data remain only on your own device.

Your video or data are not sent anywhere.

This service remembers your consent and settings by storing them locally in your browser. Storing this information is optional.

If you agree to the storing of your consent and settings locally, you will not see this prompt on your device in the future.

Privacy Policy
longText: SDC does not collect user data or require login. The service does not use cookies, but with the user's permission, it may locally store used settings and the response given to the acceptance of the terms.
